name: com.unity.graphtoolkit
description:
The Graph Toolkit package provides a comprehensive set of APIs that developers can use to create graph editing tools. This framework allows you to create tailored, node-based workflows. It handles the foundational basics so you can spend less time on setup and more time building graph solutions.

By default any graph tools built with this package conform to Unity UI and UX standards, ensuring consistency and quality. However, there is also lots of room for customization to fit the needs of unique projects.

_upm.changelog:
### Added

* First experimental release of Graph Toolkit (UGTK)

samples.description: A sample illustrating how to create a graph tool with basic texture generation
This sample describes how to use Graph Toolkit with a custom runtime.
